QuestData.Title: The Accuser's Secret
QuestData.Description:
Now that I possess the Accuser's sinstone, I can finally end her treasonous charade once and for all!
Protect me while I study this sinstone, and you will be rewarded as first among my retainers.
After I crush her with my incredible power, I will seize control of the Halls of Atonement and receive the Master's reward.
This feat heralds my own ascension to the Court of Harvesters!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Incredibly powerful Harvester in charge of the Halls of Atonement. She is currently resisting the Master.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Lord Chamberlain defeat the Accuser.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Lord Chamberlain on the Halls of Atonement balcony.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Lord Chamberlain smiles wryly.>
The Halls of Atonement are under my control.
